pc_day_ip_counts.name: username
pc_day_ip_counts.description: The learner's username on the edX platform

pc_day_ip_counts.name: ip
pc_day_ip_counts.description: A v4 or v6 IP address

pc_day_ip_counts.name: date
pc_day_ip_counts.description: The date on which the IP address was used by the learner

pc_day_ip_counts.name: ipcount
pc_day_ip_counts.description: The number of times the IP has been seen

pc_day_ip_counts.name: course_id
pc_day_ip_counts.description: course ID in the standard format as org/number/semester

description: Table generated with SQL query file pc_day_ip_counts.sql using the simeon CLI tool. It tracks the daily IP address counts of a learner on the edX platform
